channel.title: Looking for EDITER!
channel.description:
[size=36pt][b]Hello heeloooo heloooooooooooooooo![/b][/size]
I'm looking for a very nice editer on 667-718+ source
[size=24pt]EDITER[/size] OPEN OPEN
If u wanna help i pay 13dollars each hour u edit my server! (moneybookers,paypal,via phone,...) if u wanna contact me add me on skype: yentheke.haesevoet
some pics of the game now:
Client: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2v7w2gk.png[/img] Server: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2w59jyu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2227_zps4a6d9a97.png[/img] [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2228_zps589fe52d.png[/img] [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2229_zps8870d48d.png[/img] micheal is now GONE that why i need new editor [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2233_zpsb749255a.png[/img] [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/ExilReleaseV2/2013-03-04_2303_zpsa33742e1.png[/img]
-Fixed bank all lag -Added slayer points, level points and donator points w/ shops. -Added 99 anouncements & rewards -Added moneypouch & fixed dupe -Fixed all dupes known to PI including cheat engine -Fixed applyDead error -Added better woodcutting -Added better Fishing -Added better Crafting -Added Bonfires -Added Construction -Added 721 skill interface -Added custom NPC that holds most beginner shops -Added playerTitles including commands for them -Added 10+ more bosses -Added shitty zombie minigame -Added shop to duradel -Added extreme slayer tasks -Added donators dungeon -Many useful/unusful customs -Added ectophial minigame -Fixed "free quests" within quest tab -Added custom login screen -Added timed mute -Compressed all models to one file -Drop dupe taken care of -Lottery(Lottie) -662 Character models -660 model header -Login-Annoucements -2 starters per ip -Smithing (all) -Arrow dupe fixed -Fixed pm and chat crowns -added TabToReply -Use(All)Bones on altar -DragonTokens(1m gp) -No random lines on spirit shields and ghostly -Single doors -Double doors -Added FunPK -Fixed korasi spec -Hand cannon started -Player Owned Shops -721 Emotes tab -NPC facing -Half way finished with theiving -Removed money pouch(Rendered useless to me) -Added EXP drop(when xp orb is clicked) -Nex added -New teleport interfaces(ripped from an old delta i use to play) -Many new interfaces overall -Smoother rendering -Smoother color definition -Half way done drops to match new economy -Control panel -Auto-Updating cache -Fixed a few minor bugs in slayer system -New donator chat symbol(Rofl) -New home -Completely coded penguin BOSS(for shits and giggles)[goodluck finding too] -Re added donators dungeon
-BUT STILL IT NEED ALOT WORK MORE SHOPS ETC....-
Well who will be the new coder ;) ( he will also be co-owner) soon the server will be 24/7 online and moparscape will sponser it :)
Dont forgot to add me on skype yentheke.haesevoet (24/7 online)

item.title: Looking for EDITER!
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Considering services provided on Mopar are supposed to be free, both of you broke rules.
Therefore, we can conclude that karma bit both of you in the rear end.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for EDITER!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Bellend:

This guy is a tit. i did as he asked and didn’t get paid, so i didn’t give him the files. im guessing he doesn’t have the money and is just looking for free work.

Seems legit.

[size=36pt]Hello heeloooo heloooooooooooooooo![/size]

I’m looking for a very nice editer on 667-718+ source

[size=24pt]EDITER[/size]
OPEN
OPEN

If u wanna help i pay 13dollars each hour u edit my server! (moneybookers,paypal,via phone,…)
if u wanna contact me add me on skype: yentheke.haesevoet

-Fixed bank all lag
-Added slayer points, level points and donator points w/ shops.
-Added 99 anouncements & rewards
-Added moneypouch & fixed dupe
-Fixed all dupes known to PI including cheat engine
-Fixed applyDead error
-Added better woodcutting
-Added better Fishing
-Added better Crafting
-Added Bonfires
-Added Construction
-Added 721 skill interface
-Added custom NPC that holds most beginner shops
-Added playerTitles including commands for them
-Added 10+ more bosses
-Added shitty zombie minigame
-Added shop to duradel
-Added extreme slayer tasks
-Added donators dungeon
-Many useful/unusful customs
-Added ectophial minigame
-Fixed “free quests” within quest tab
-Added custom login screen
-Added timed mute
-Compressed all models to one file
-Drop dupe taken care of
-Lottery(Lottie)
-662 Character models
-660 model header
-Login-Annoucements
-2 starters per ip
-Smithing (all)
-Arrow dupe fixed
-Fixed pm and chat crowns
-added TabToReply
-Use(All)Bones on altar
-DragonTokens(1m gp)
-No random lines on spirit shields and ghostly
-Single doors
-Double doors
-Added FunPK
-Fixed korasi spec
-Hand cannon started
-Player Owned Shops
-721 Emotes tab
-NPC facing
-Half way finished with theiving
-Removed money pouch(Rendered useless to me)
-Added EXP drop(when xp orb is clicked)
-Nex added
-New teleport interfaces(ripped from an old delta i use to play)
-Many new interfaces overall
-Smoother rendering
-Smoother color definition
-Half way done drops to match new economy
-Control panel
-Auto-Updating cache
-Fixed a few minor bugs in slayer system
-New donator chat symbol(Rofl)
-New home
-Completely coded penguin BOSS(for shits and giggles)[goodluck finding too]
-Re added donators dungeon

-BUT STILL IT NEED ALOT WORK MORE SHOPS ETC…-

Well who will be the new coder ( he will also be co-owner) soon the server will be 24/7 online and moparscape will sponser it

Dont forgot to add me on skype yentheke.haesevoet (24/7 online)
